name: UpdateDatasetItem
description:
Update an existing dataset item with new information.

This tool updates an existing dataset item identified by project and item IDs. Use it when you need to modify details or correct information in a dataset.

parameters.name: dataset_item_id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying the dataset item to update.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this dataset item.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: Project ID of the project to access. You can find this ID by making a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: dataset_item_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details for the dataset item update, such as `id`, `dataset`, and any associated metadata.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A UUID string identifying this dataset item.

value_schema.description: A UUID string identifying this dataset item.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
